titles.title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 relating to cost sharing.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Referred to Subcommittee on Water Resources.

bill.summary: 4/29/1988--Introduced. Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 to provide that the cost sharing provisions do not apply to: (1) the construction of harbors with a depth of 20 feet or less; (2) certain flood control projects in Arkansas within the boundaries of the watersheds of the Mississippi River and tributaries; and (3) the feasibility studies, planning, engineering, and design of such flood control projects.
